column1: Little Goat Diner////An improved performance from my first visit soon after Little Goat opened more than three years ago.  We stuck to a couple of now-popular staples
column2: including the Bull's Eye French Toast and the Chickpea Salad
column3: and they were both fantastic.  The Tempura Mashed Potatoes were a miss but everything else about our visit last week was very strong
column4: and you get a lot of food for these prices.  Great for kids
column5: since it's so loud in this place
column7: getting a rezzie on OpenTable is pretty easy nowadays.
